channel.title: Attack and dead animations from yak are fudged up
channel.description: I have a problem with the yak attack and dead animations: [img]http://media.giphy.com/media/xTiTntO2vLmZCWc4Ok/giphy.gif[/img] This is what I am using: getDeadEmote: [code]case 5529: return 5784;[/code] getAttackEmote: [code]case 5529: return 5782;[/code]

item.title: Attack and dead animations from yak are fudged up
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

I have a problem with the yak attack and dead animations:

This is what I am using:
getDeadEmote:

case 5529: return 5784;
getAttackEmote:

case 5529: return 5782;

Read full topic
item.source: Attack and dead animations from yak are fudged up
